contentList.content: You and any nearby Fiends and Undead deal an additional [1] with melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attacks</LSTag>.
The Paladin and any nearby Fiends and Undead deal an additional [1] with melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attacks</LSTag>.
Deals an additional [2] with melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attacks</LSTag> while within [1] of the spellcaster.
Additional[1] scales with the Paladin's <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
